name: Between Lands
description:
Between Lands is the first and latest project in development by Switchspoon Studios. The game will be made in RPG Maker MV and will involve a captivating story with zero combat. 

Currently available for download is a short demo demonstrating the least of what can be done, however this will likely be updated to show more of what is capable in Between Lands.

The demo has currently been pulled due to being outdated. A more polished demo with more content will be uploaded once it is ready.

Press Enter to read signs and enter doors.

Known issues:

  • The game page button doesn't work.
  • The menu doesn't display properly
  • Music and sounds have a large delay before starting
  • Attempting to access the settings will result in a crash, throwing up an error
